post:
To celebrate our recent move into the Accelerated data center in Frankfurt, Germany, we'd like to present you some very nice offers.

Our new data center has excellent peerings with providers like DTAG, Level 3 and GTT. It's very high quality and offers you excellent connections across the world. Very low latency. [Looking glass](http://lg.accelerated.de/lg.cgi)


**CloudServer 10G**  
512 MB DDR4 ECC memory  
1 vCPU Intel Xeon E5-2620 v4  
10 GB SSD  
3,00€ per month (~ 3.36 USD, 36€ per year)  
[Order now](https://www.farnox.net/sites/offers)


**CloudServer 20G**  
1024 MB DDR4 ECC memory  
1 vCPU Intel Xeon E5-2620 v4  
20 GB SSD  
5,00€ per month (~ 5.60 USD, 60€ per year)  
[Order now](https://www.farnox.net/sites/offers)


**Special offer**: Pay six months in advance and get one month free or pay a year in advance and get three months free. This is recurring and includes all CloudServers we offer, including those that do not fit into LET price range.



**Dedicated Server AMD Ryzen 1700**  
CPU: [AMD Ryzen 1700](https://www.amd.com/en/products/cpu/amd-ryzen-7-1700) 8x 3.00 GHz  
Memory: 32 GB DDR4 (64 GB: +10€ per month)  
Disk: 2x 525 GB SSD (4x 525 GB SSD: +10€ per month)  
Uplink: 100 MBit/s (1 GBit/s: 2.50€ per month, free if paid yearly)  
IPv4: 1x IPv4 (additional IPs and subnets available on request)  
IPv6: 1x /64  
**44€ per month (~ 49.26 USD)**  
[Order now](https://www.farnox.net/offers/dedicated)


**Dedicated Server AMD FX-6300**  
CPU: [AMD FX-6300](http://cpuboss.com/cpu/AMD-FX-6300)  6x 3.50 GHz
Memory: 32 GB DDR3  
Disk: 2x 1 TB HDD 7200 RPM (4x 1 TB HDD 7200 RPM: +5€ per month)  
Uplink: 100 MBit/s (1 GBit/s: 2.50€ per month, free if paid yearly)  
IPv4: 1x IPv4 (additional IPs and subnets available on request)  
IPv6: 1x /64  
**39€ per month (~ 43.66 USD)**  
[Order now](https://www.farnox.net/offers/dedicated)


**Dedicated Server Intel Core i5-4440**  
CPU: [Intel Core i5-4440](http://cpuboss.com/cpu/Intel-Core-i5-4440) 4x 3.10 GHz  
Memory: 32 GB DDR3  
Disk: 2x 2 TB HDD 7200 RPM  
Uplink: 100 MBit/s (1 GBit/s: 2.50€ per month, free if paid yearly)  
IPv4: 1x IPv4 (additional IPs and subnets available on request)  
IPv6: 1x /64  
**39€ per month (~ 43.66 USD)**  
[Order now](https://www.farnox.net/offers/dedicated)


For all dedicated servers: One month free if paid quarterly or two months free if paid yearly. This includes all upgrades.


You can reset the dedicated servers and reinstall the operating system using our control panel. Since this was asked before: The reset function works using devices connected to the reset pins on the motherboard and the reinstalls work using a PXE boot server.

Screenshots: [Bandwidth](http://imgur.com/a/sUTaP) [Reset](http://imgur.com/a/5OeVI) [Reinstall OS](http://imgur.com/a/sGHur) [Available OS](http://imgur.com/a/GZo5m)
